title: Calories in Cracker Barrel Biscuit
meta_description: Learn calories in cracker barrel biscuit, including full nutrition facts like carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and serving tips for 1 biscuit.
assumptions: Standard buttermilk biscuit from Cracker Barrel menu, as served (~56 g), baked fresh without added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and preparation; check Cracker Barrel's menu or app for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One Cracker Barrel biscuit provides ~160 kcal, mainly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with restaurant or packaged info.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Cracker Barrel biscuit?
What are the carbs in a Cracker Barrel biscuit?
faqs.a: About 22 g total carbs, including 1 g fiber and 2 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a Cracker Barrel biscuit high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 380 mg sodium per biscuit due to baking powder and salt.

faqs.q: How much fat in Cracker Barrel biscuit?
faqs.a: 7 g total fat, with 2 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Can I get nutrition for multiple Cracker Barrel biscuits?
faqs.a: Scale up: 2 biscuits â‰ˆ320 kcal, 44 g carbs, 760 mg sodium.
